title: Bats Day and Night
description: Bats Day and Night gives readers an inside look at bats' daily routines. The simple sentences and interesting photographs support early-emergent readers as they learn about what bats do during different times of day and night. Use this interesting subject to teach students about sequencing events and using verbs.
